knimeNode.name: Golden Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Stores the golden DataTable in a regression test.

intro.p: This node is used in regression tests to store the golden output table of the connected predecessor node. The node just forwards the table at its input port to its output port. Keep this node executed when saving the test flow. Use it to preserve a good/golden/correct table that you then feed into the table differ node to compare it with the table produced during the regression test run.

ports.dataIn: The table to store for future regression runs
ports.dataOut: The table preserved from a good run
